overview:
Zia Fazal has extensive experience in development of web applications using both open source and Microsoft technologies. He has been developing cutting edge web applications which include Content Management Systems, Search Engine Optimizers and e-Commerce Solutions since 2001.

Zia started his career at Sulata iSoft and contributed to development of many e-Commerce and Social Networking applications. Zia joined Libertas Solutions later and refined the core functions of Libertas Enterprise Content Management System making it one of the few CMSs which support accessibility guidelines, web standards, Dublin Core metadata standard and search engine friendliness. Zia also played a pivotal role in Report Automation of the OrthoClear ERP system.
